column1: "...every day." Me, too, Dame Helen; me, too.
"I like to move forward not back."  Huh, lies, all lies!

'A great credit to their Father'?? Umm, no Helen. They are a great credit to ther late MOTHER actually. Their sensitivity, social conscience and down to earth manner have ZILCH to do with that stuffed shirt Charles, and everything to do with the way Diana raised them and the qualities she instilled in them until she died. They themselves have said as much in interviews.

'Only', like she missed by a big chance.
Anyway, i couldn't care less
